metadata.name: Aldene
metadata.description:
To the women in my life,  
So strong and full of grace,  
They guide me with their wisdom,  
And help me find my place. 

From my grandmother, who showed me what is possible,  
And helped me to stay strong.  
From my mother, who nurtured me,  
And taught me right from wrong,  

There are friends and mentors, too,  
Who've offered guidance and support,  
They've helped me grow, learn, and thrive,  
And gave me the courage to explore new things.

So here's a heartfelt thank you,  
To all the women in my life,  
For everything you've done for me,  
I am forever grateful, and I will always strive  
To be the best version of myself,  
Because of the love and guidance you provide.

This license is for personal use only. The non-commercial use of the 1/1 NFT is free to display on personal devices, virtual galleries, or SM platforms with credit to the artist. No artwork derivatives or commercial rights are included. Full copyright remains with creator Kristen Valent.
